text:
[Verse]
Painted skies so high above
Golden hues and endless love
Whispers in the evening breeze
Take my hand come follow me

[Verse 2]
Shadows stretch and day grows dim
Stars awake their nightly hymn
Hold your breath the night begins
Twinkling lights our secret friends

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams a world aglow
Colors burst like rainbows show
Hand in hand through twilight's gleam
Caught inside our sunset dreams

[Verse 3]
Waves they crash on sandy shore
Echoes of our hearts implore
Moonlight plays upon the sea
Guiding us through mystery

[Bridge]
City lights fade in the dark
We are dancing in the park
Midnight whispers fill the air
Magic moments everywhere

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams a world aglow
Colors burst like rainbows show
Hand in hand through twilight's gleam
Caught inside our sunset dreams
title: Sunset Dreams
